=== What is it? ===

The gojoyent package enables <nowiki>[[http://golang.org|Go]]</nowiki> programs to interact with
the <nowiki>[[http://www.joyent.com/products/compute-service|Joyent Compute]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.joyent.com/products/manta|Joyent Manta]]</nowiki> services.

The following packages are available at the moment:

** launchpad.net/gojoyent/cloudapi
** launchpad.net/gojoyent/manta

=== API documentation ===

The API documentation is currently available at:

** http://godoc.org/launchpad.net/gojoyent

=== Source code ===

To obtain the source code, use <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.canonical.com|Bazaar]]</nowiki> to download projects from Launchpad:
<pre>
$ bzr branch lp:gojoyent
</pre>

=== Reporting bugs ===

Please report bugs at:

    https://launchpad.net/gojoyent

=== How to build and install gojoyent ===

Just use "go get" with any of the available packages. For example:
<pre>
$ go get launchpad.net/gojoyent/cloudapi
$ go get launchpad.net/gojoyent/manta
</pre>

=== Running tests ===

To run tests, first install <nowiki>[[http://labix.org/gocheck|gocheck]]</nowiki> with:
<pre>
$ goinstall launchpad.net/gocheck
</pre>

Then run go test as usual:
<pre>
$ go test launchpad.net/gojoyent/...
</pre>
